metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21690 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: OnionShare is an open source tool that lets you securely and anonymouslyshare files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network. Inaffected versions The path parameter of the requested URL is not sanitizedbefore being passed to the QT frontend. This path is used in all componentsfor displaying the server access history. This leads to a rendered HTML4Subset (QT RichText editor) in the Onionshare frontend.

criterions.comment: onionshare: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
